title: Unknown Error When Installing LOL
body:
Hello, 

I'm having issues with installing league of legends. I've tried installing it 4 different times now and every time I get to 60% downloaded an unexpected error pops up so I have to reinstall. Can someone help me out please???

replies.body: sorry that all I know when you click on the link it should download
thank you. i got LOL to install

Unknown errors during patching at 60% are generally caused by an unstable connection to the server. There are certainly a number of potential causes, but our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) does a great job of listing the most common fixes.

If you continue to see issues patching after working through that guide, let me know.

(http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/Installer/SingleFileInstall/LeagueOfLegendsBaseEUNE.exe)
 it that teah op guy pick one that fit you

it help me hope it work for you
it should work 
it will work
there is nothing in the link. says file not found...
go to support then search install error they will give you link
nothing helped. i keep getting the unknown error. any suggestions?
ugh now it wont download past 2%... Idk what to do
Thanks m8. I just power cycled my router and started the reinstall. I'll check the link out as well.
oh yeah that happen to me too it your window
